plot: At its simplest, The Electric Arctic Circle is a motorcycle excursion to the Arctic Circle captured on film, a generically American formula so familiar and true that it begs at every splice...
title: The Electric Arctic Circle
plot_es: At its simplest, The Electric Arctic Circle is a motorcycle excursion to the Arctic Circle captured on film, a generically American formula so familiar and true that it begs at every splice...
plot_en: At its simplest, The Electric Arctic Circle is a motorcycle excursion to the Arctic Circle captured on film, a generically American formula so familiar and true that it begs at every splice...
